predicate.note: Frames file for 'stream' based on sentences in financial subcorpus and automatic expansion via verbnet. Comparison with 'flow' and 'pour'.

example.name: senseless violence
example.text: After Mary hit him, John's nose streamed blood for a week.

example.name: more senseless violence
example.text: After Mary hit him, John's nose streamed with blood for a week.

example.name: unaccusative
example.text: About $60 million streamed out last week alone, double the level of the week following last month's Campeau Corp. credit squeeze.
example.arg: double the level of the week following last month's Campeau Corp. credit squeeze
